timeline.title: Full Stack Developer
timeline.description: A 12-week, fast-paced remote bootcamp, focusing on JavaScript (ES6), TypeScript, React, HTML5, CSS, and server-side programming with Node.js, with weekly projects covering everything from the fundamentals to full stack frameworks. Working with Agile methodology through weekly sprint planning, check-ins, demos, and reflections. Mob-programming and pair programming make up a significant part of the course.
responsibilities: Developed full-stack applications using modern JavaScript technologies
Worked with React, TypeScript, Node.js, and HTML5/CSS
Participated in Agile development with weekly sprints
Engaged in mob-programming and pair-programming sessions
achievements: Completed intensive 12-week bootcamp
Built multiple full-stack projects
Mastered modern development methodologies

timeline.title: Founder
timeline.description: As a freelancing generalist, I make use of the ability to learn and adapt to new situations. I pick up things that I need to learn, for my customers. Some of the things that me and my team have been doing in the past years include: Set up a self-hosted Discourse forum, Numerous websites designed and set up, Various IT-related tasks like hosting solutions and e-mail server management, Podcast Editing for one of the biggest podcasts in Personal Finance in Sweden, Built and managed databases in Airtable for a variety of use cases, Video editing and post-production work, Helped 4 clients start and distribute their own podcasts, Coaching individuals and teams, Advised on, bought and assembled an office tech solution for a small company.
responsibilities: Set up self-hosted Discourse forums and technical infrastructure
Designed and developed numerous websites for clients
Managed IT solutions including hosting and e-mail servers
Edited podcasts for major Swedish personal finance platforms
Built and managed databases in Airtable for various use cases
Provided video editing and post-production services
Helped clients launch and distribute podcasts
Provided coaching services to individuals and teams
Consulted on office technology solutions
achievements: Successfully ran independent consulting business for 5+ years
Delivered projects across multiple technical domains
Built diverse portfolio of client solutions
Managed team and client relationships

timeline.title: Product Marketing Specialist
timeline.description: Full-time product marketing specialist role focusing on copywriting, SEO, and SaaS marketing strategies.
responsibilities: Developed product marketing strategies for SaaS products
Created compelling copy for various marketing materials
Implemented SEO strategies to improve organic visibility
Analyzed market trends and competitive positioning
achievements: Improved organic search visibility
Created high-converting marketing copy
Contributed to product positioning strategy

timeline.title: Communications Manager
timeline.description: Managed communications strategy and content publication for legal services platform. Responsible for blog content, technical SEO, performance reporting, and PPC campaigns.
responsibilities: Managed the editorial calendar and ensured consistent publication of blog articles
Oversaw content accountability, including technical SEO and performance reporting to the CMO
Managed PPC campaigns on Meta, Bing, and Google Ads, primarily focusing on copywriting
Handled keyword analysis, budget management, and strategy alignment with KPIs
Led a team of 3-5 law students
Created and implemented email campaigns directly targeted at customers
Identified and executed affiliate partnerships with relevant influencers and podcasts
achievements: Successfully managed editorial calendar with consistent content publication
Improved technical SEO performance with regular reporting
Led and mentored team of 3-5 students
Established strategic partnerships with influencers and podcasts

timeline.title: Communication Professional
timeline.description: Handled communications and investor relations for investment company. Managed yearly investor meetings, database management, and stakeholder communications.
responsibilities: Co-managed yearly event 'Polynom-dagen' with 220 participants
Wrote monthly and bi-weekly newsletters to investors
Setup and management of databases
Various automations to improve contracts
Automated onboarding funnels for investors
Started an internal podcast for investors
Created investor council for stakeholder feedback
Strategy for finding new investors
Oversaw CRM and CMS software
achievements: Successfully managed investor event with 220+ participants
Implemented automated investor onboarding systems
Launched internal investor podcast
Established investor council for improved communication

timeline.title: Executive Assistant
timeline.description: Provided executive support and helped with various business development tasks. Worked with Sweden's largest personal finance blog, managing social media channels and content creation.
responsibilities: Managed social media channels for Sweden's largest personal finance blog
Provided executive support to leadership team
Handled video editing and content production
Supported business development initiatives
Created content marketing strategies
achievements: Contributed to Sweden's largest personal finance platform
Streamlined content production processes
Supported successful business development initiatives

timeline.title: Youth Coach
timeline.description: Worked with youth development and support programs. Provided mentoring and guidance to teenagers with action plans from social services.
responsibilities: Provided mentoring and support to teenagers
Developed recreational activities and programs
Offered mental health support and guidance
Supported educational development and planning
achievements: Successfully supported multiple teenagers in their development
Developed effective youth engagement programs
Built strong relationships with program participants

timeline.title: Project Manager
timeline.description: Led project management for digital initiatives. Co-created the project #FUELMillion where Project FUEL was going to collect a total of 1 million life lessons in 2020.
responsibilities: Led project management for the #FUELMillion initiative
Coordinated collection of life lessons and personal stories
Created educational material for various types of learners
Managed project timeline and deliverables
achievements: Successfully managed major digital collection project
Coordinated community engagement for educational purposes
Delivered project milestones on schedule

timeline.title: Co-Creator
timeline.description: Co-founded and developed creative projects with focus on energy and sustainability themes.
responsibilities: Co-created innovative projects focused on energy themes
Developed creative content and marketing strategies
Managed project development from concept to execution
achievements: Successfully co-founded and launched creative venture
Developed innovative energy-focused content
Built sustainable business model

timeline.title: Host
timeline.description: Hosted conversations and events. Focused on meaningful dialogue and community building.
responsibilities: Hosted engaging conversations and community events
Facilitated meaningful dialogues between participants
Created content for social media and video platforms
achievements: Successfully hosted numerous community conversations
Built strong local community connections
Created engaging video content series

timeline.title: Host
timeline.description: Hosted 'Learning of Today' (Lärdom för dagen), a vlog series shot almost every weekday talking about something learned in the past couple of days. Available on Facebook and YouTube.
responsibilities: Created and hosted daily video blog content
Researched and presented educational topics
Managed content production and distribution
Built audience engagement across social media platforms
achievements: Maintained consistent daily content creation schedule
Built engaged audience across multiple platforms
Created educational content that resonated with viewers

timeline.title: Internship on Project Management
timeline.description: Gained experience in project management through hands-on internship. Involved in management-level projects including the Visual Viking Academy training in visual thinking and graphical recording.
responsibilities: Participated in management-level project planning and execution
Learned Visual Thinking and graphical recording techniques
Supported Visual Viking Academy training programs
Assisted with project coordination and client relations
achievements: Completed comprehensive project management internship
Mastered Visual Thinking methodologies
Contributed to successful training program development

timeline.title: Project Manager
timeline.description: Managed projects for cultural initiatives. Organized a side event for a theatre show called 'Den e VI' that was shown at Malmö City Theatre. Booked a live band, produced a short documentary about the city and made decorations for the room.
responsibilities: Organized cultural events for theatre productions
Coordinated with Malmö City Theatre for venue and logistics
Booked live musical performances for events
Produced documentary content about local community
Created event decorations and atmospheric design
achievements: Successfully produced theatre event at Malmö City Theatre
Created compelling documentary about local community
Managed all aspects of event production from booking to decoration

timeline.title: Assistant Project Manager
timeline.description: Assisted with project management for basketball federation initiatives. Had responsibilities regarding finding potential collaborations and sending applications for funding in the startup of a project called 'Home Court' to get young kids to exercise more using basketball as a tool.
responsibilities: Identified and developed potential collaboration opportunities
Prepared and submitted funding applications for sports projects
Supported the startup and development of 'Home Court' project
Coordinated with basketball clubs and community organizations
achievements: Successfully secured funding for 'Home Court' project
Established valuable partnerships within basketball community
Contributed to youth exercise and sports engagement initiatives

timeline.title: Project Manager
timeline.description: Community Activists started as a Reach For Change-funded project. Played a key role in going from just a project to creating an NGO and building the organization from the ground up. Hired as project manager and admin, but quickly became responsible for personnel, sales, planning as well as administration and managing projects.
responsibilities: Led transformation from project to established NGO
Managed personnel, sales, and strategic planning
Handled administration and project management
Built organizational structure from ground up
achievements: Successfully transformed project into sustainable NGO
Built comprehensive organizational structure
Established effective management and operational systems

timeline.title: CFO and Co-founder
timeline.description: Co-founded a company through Young Entrepreneurship (Ung Företagsamhet) as a school project during final year at Bladins Gymnasium. Sold homecare and miscellaneous services. Achieved a turnover of almost 100,000 SEK over the first 5 months.
responsibilities: Co-founded and managed student company through Young Entrepreneurship program
Handled financial management and strategic planning as CFO
Developed and marketed homecare and miscellaneous services
Managed business operations and client relationships
achievements: Achieved turnover of 100,000 SEK in first 5 months
Successfully launched and operated student company
Demonstrated entrepreneurial skills during high school
